about_the_game:
The industrial and mechanical world of The Abandoned Presence is a dangerous place full of dark secrets. Playing as Zoe, a young woman who grew up in this unforgiving city, you’re tasked with the challenge of fighting your way to the heart of urban colonization to uncover its cruelest secrets.

In true Metroidvania fashion, by exploring the hidden passages of the vibrant city, you’ll unlock new perks and abilities, including wall jumps, double jumps, and air dashes. Use your new tools to access new areas and discover more dark secrets hidden within the city.

Combo-tastic combat


Exploring the urban jungle of The Abandon Presence is no easy task. Zoe will face the challenge of patrol units, elite enemies, and mechanized bosses, all hoping to keep the city's secrets under lock n key.

Fighting your way through mobs of enemies will reward you with resources to learn new combo-focussed skills. Each weapon offers its own skill tree to learn, with will increase both its combo potential and its stagger potential.

Key features

-Explore a stunning urban landscape heavily inspired by urban India
-Learn powerful combos to defeat a range of challenging enemies
-Find hidden secrets to discover the lore of the city as well as unlock new abilities for Zoe
-A beautifully curated soundtrack that ushers the pace of the gameplay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-7700HQ @2.80Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: The above settings works well after resetting the graphics settings available in options menu within the game
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The Abandoned Presence is a gritty and challenging Metroidvania set in a world heavily inspired by India's urban heritage and industrial core. Search for answers as Zoe; wield industrial weapons, traverse city skylines, and take on elite enemies to uncover the secrets of The Abandoned Presence.
